userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Commission of Oyer and Terminer, 1733 Jul 4, Manuscript # MS 2000.70 (1X), John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Commission to Robert Bolling, Richard Bland, and others. Concerns a slave of Daniel Elbank from Prince George County, Virginia who is to remain in jail on suspicion of felony.
